sentences.en: I was accused of being an archfascist a saboteur and the instigator of a resistance movement.
sentences.cn: 我被指控为一名极端法西斯,破坏者以及反抗运动的煽动者.

sentences.en: Saboteur - This will allow your Redeemer to auto - repair.
sentences.cn: 破坏者 —— 这将让你的救赎者可以自动修复.

sentences.en: Saboteur: Booby Trap Mine splash radius increased sensitively.
sentences.cn: 破坏者: 诡雷杀伤范围明显增大.

sentences.en: The lorries were wrecked by saboteurs.
sentences.cn: 这些大卡车被人蓄意损毁。

words.tran_cn: 怠工者，破坏者；从事破坏活动者

trans.tran_en: someone who deliberately damages, destroys, or spoils someone else’s property or activities, in order to prevent them from doing something
